newsitem.title: UK: UK's OFT invites comment on Imperial merger.
newsitem.headline: UK's OFT invites comment on Imperial merger.

text.p: Britain's Director General of Fair Trading called on Friday for comments from the industry on the implications for competition of the proposed acquisition of Rizla International BV by Imperial Tobacco Group Plc.
The OFT comment period ends on March 21.
In January, Imperial, which was demerged from conglomerate Hanson Plc last October, announced the acquisiton of Rizla for 168 million stg as well as 17 million stg of debt.
Rizla is the world's largest maker and seller of handrolling tobacco papers.
